item.title: Is the UK data protection authority granting big tech giants a free pass?
item.description:
Asress Adimi Gikay (PhD), Senior Lecture in AI, Disruptive Innovation and Law (Brunel University London) Photo credit: howtostartablogonline.netÂ Online, the phrase “we value your privacy” often rings hollow. Despite promises, businesses lack the motivation to truly prioritize data privacy. This holds true even within the European Union (EU) and its comprehensive data protection law, the GDPR. Businesses frequently disregard these rules while regulators struggle to enforce them or simply overlook infractions...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/is-the-uk-data-protection-authority-granting-big-tech-giants-a-free-pass/
